successes.title: Raging Heroes - The Toughest Girls of the Galaxy
successes.description: Three outstanding armies of decidedly full of attitude 28mm-scale female miniatures for gaming, painting and collecting.

Pledges.description: ROOKIE - Our most sincere thanks + a lavishly designed digital artbook featuring the art of the Toughest Girls of the Galaxy (Retail value $14). Designed as a real Digital coffee table book, it will include all the TGG concept art, many unreleased sketches, stories and background, embedded videos of concert art drawing and 3D sculpting, and more... A very special treat if you like the Toughest Girls of the Galaxy!
PRIVATE - 1 Heroine (one of the $10 or $15 Heroines) + the TGG Digital Artbook.
Shipping included for 1 Heroine. Otherwise, US add $23. EU add 20$. France add $10. Other countries, please see FAQ.
FIRST CLASS BOX - 4 $10 Heroines (or $40 worth of Heroines) + the TGG Digital Artbook.
Shipping: US add $23. EU add 20$. France add $10. Other countries, please see FAQ.
CADET BOX - 2x$10 Heroines (or $20 worth of Heroines) + 4x$15 Troops (or $60 worth of Troops) + Kickstarter exclusive miniature + the TGG Digital Artbook.
Shipping: US add $23. EU add 20$. France add $10. Other countries, please see FAQ.
PAINTER BOX - 8 $10 Heroines (or $80 worth of Heroines) + Kickstarter exclusive miniature + the TGG Digital Artbook.
Shipping: US add $23. EU add 20$. France add $10. Other countries, please see FAQ.

3D SCULPTING WEBINAR:
3-hour 3D sculpting webinar with the Raging Heroes team via Skype limited to10 participants at once so that you can interact and ask questions. 
Can be combined with any other pledge level. Contact us for more info.

ART DIRECTION WEBINAR:
3-hour Art Direction webinar with the Raging Heroes team via Skype limited to10 participants at once so that you can interact and ask questions. 
Can be combined with any other pledge level. Contact us for more info.
